title: Does Sacha Baron Cohen go too far? - Quora

response.answer_text: He pushes the envelope. Whether it’s too far is a matter of opinion. That line is ever changing. The social mores of the 1950’s are not the same as the 70’s. The same can be said of the 1970’s and the 2000’s. Comedy has to push a bit or its lame. As long as the intention is to be funny then it’s fine.
When he duped people when he is in character, no. These people should be smart enough to know better. Now the stunt with Emenim, that was too far.
